newsitem.title: USA: FOCUS-US cap gains cut seen unleashing share bears.
newsitem.headline: FOCUS-US cap gains cut seen unleashing share bears.

text.p: Wall Street will likely be hit by unleashed selling pressure on Thursday triggered by news of a proposal to make a capital gains tax cut effective as of May 7, analysts said.
But longer term the tax cut will be bullish for stocks, they said.

Those investors who think the stock market is in trouble because of potential hikes in interest rates may be prompted by the tax cut to take profits, said Peter Canelo, chief investment strategist at Dean Witter.
